metadata.title: Smoke Alarms
metadata.description: This quiz is for people who have completed the Fire Warden Advanced Course at FES. It tests your knowledge on highly advanced concepts related to smoke alarms

quiz_questions.question: What does the white band at the top of the extinghuisher signify?
Where should you point the fire extinguisher?
Should you use the extinguisher when the arrow is not inside the green section of the dial?
